overview: Steve Flohr oversees Intercim?s Professional Services, Corporate Quality, Corporate IT and Technical Support departments as well as the company?s offshore delivery team. In addition, Steve is also the executive liaison to Boeing 787 relating to the Dreamliner implementation efforts. Prior to joining Intercim, Steve spent more than 25 years working in software systems and technology. His background includes six years as general manager of US Operations for Control Data Systems and four years as General Manager of Marketing at Control Data Corporation. Steve also worked abroad serving as CEO of ICEM Systems GmbH, a Control Data ? Volkswagen joint venture that developed CAD-CAM 3D modeling software.
